TopicTitle: Hello, old programmer returning from a 1 year hiatus

Articles.Content:
hello everyone, i actually registered some time a year ago and have since left the forums due to college being so busy and just general loss of interest in KSP.

when i started playing KSP, it was at 0.17 and mod support was very different (no GameData folder and no resources, there were no electricity!) and back then i wrote a windows application to deal with it.

about 4 days ago i found the source of my program on my website servers when managing my website and after looking at the code i wrote a year ago (i am only a computer science major, not a computer scientist yet), i laughed at how terrible my code was and got interested in the program again, hence i decided to re-do my program and add tons of features into it since it is now much easier to work with KSP.

i am just saying hi at the welcome thread (and getting the 3 post requirement) and maybe show off some of my WIP on the program which interfaces seamlessly with kerbal spaceport to allow access of the kerbal spaceport program-wise and auto updating mods in a very user friendly fashion

some pics
theres no shortage of ambitious modifiers around here you'll fit right in .

Greetings! There is not such thing as "To many mods" around here. Good luck with your rockets, and that code looks fancy. I'll keep an eye on you

Edited March 16, 2014 by Boosterspice
Excrement occur
Welcome back to the community thelegendaryblah, shame your old account was lost when the old site died, but it's good to have you back
